name: The Salvation Experiment
description:
The Salvation Experiment is a nonprofit game created with a team of people who want to see the experiment's results. What should we do from there? 

This is the Beta for the Game, we are going to be using the unreal engine to create the idea that you are playing with in this game.

The backstory that was to huge to put into the test of this game so we have included the website information to understand more of the lore behind the game. 

To get an idea on what we are going to accomplish with this game and go to the website to learn how to get FREE STUFF FOR UNLOCKING CERTAIN LEVELS OF THE GAME

Go To Our YouTube Channel

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZriqFicrPr8neaebd3lifQ

For more Information on Giveaways as well. 

This is what the game is going to accomplish

https://gf.me/u/ybnkuq

Their YouTube Channel 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC87Ya45U5hQYvTXZ8e1YjjQ/videos

Send all your reviews on the information that you find and if you have any questions you can send them to salvationthuragamer@outlook.com 

We can't wait to hear from you again!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
